3_1FHN4oukAG7zFUpiC9L2iz7QpQVTuT3xkz.body:
In case your browser don't support playing flash from the url directly (firefox and chrome don't support so), you can use this simple html wrapper:
```
<object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" id="CWUS" name="CWUS" align="middle"
data="/home/username/Downloads/filename.swf"
width="100%" height="98%"><param name="quality" value="high"><param name="bgcolor" value="#ffffff"><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"><param name="allowfullscreen" value="true"></object>
```

1_1LydvXhjUXUFr88yhNoDfgT9LyKRiX9zCB.body:

the implicit cost is your harddisk storage and network bandwidth, which is cheap nowadays
